highlights: Conducted RFQ follow-ups, price quoting, and negotiations for new products.
Assisted in cost reduction initiatives and monitored sales activities.
Collaborated with production teams to meet customer demands.
Regular customer follow-up on supply chain activities.
Managed design, manufacturing, and inspection of components based on GD&T.
Oversaw process planning, vendor selection, and production planning.
Streamlined component assembly and maintained material specifications.
